title: Miso Ramen
description: Miso gives ramen broth a strong, pleasantly sharp umami flavor. Topped with seaweed and vegetables.

title: Shio Ramen
description: Made from a chicken broth base. It's a lighter-bodied, lighter-flavored ramen.

title: Sapporo Ramen
description: Sapporo's ramen is thick and hearty. Comes with thicker noodles and topped with Hokkaido's specialties.

title: Tonkotsu Ramen
description: Features a rich broth made from pork bones. Topped with slices of pork chashu and assorted veggies.

title: Tonkatsu Pork Bento
description: Crispy breaded pork cutlet served with tangy tonkatsu sauce, rice, and assorted sides.

title: Teppanyaki Steak Bento
description: Succulent slices of grilled steak, served with vegetables, rice, and a savory dipping sauce.

title: Teriyaki Chicken Bento
description: Grilled chicken glazed in a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce, accompanied by rice and traditional Japanese sides.

title: Eel Bento
description: Tender grilled eel served with a rich unagi sauce, rice, and pickled vegetables.

title: Salmon Bento
description: Fresh, flavorful slices of grilled or teriyaki-glazed salmon, paired with rice and seasonal accompaniments.

title: Tamagoyaki Bento
description: Delicate layers of Japanese rolled omelet, served with rice and an assortment of traditional side dishes.

title: Tekka Maki
description: A simple roll filled with raw tuna and wrapped in seaweed and sushi rice.

title: Negitoro Roll
description: A roll filled with minced fatty tuna (negitoro) and green onions, wrapped in seaweed and sushi rice.

title: Unagi Roll
description: A roll filled with grilled freshwater eel (unagi), cucumber, and sometimes avocado, wrapped in seaweed and sushi rice.

title: Salmon Avocado Roll
description: A roll filled with fresh salmon slices and creamy avocado wrapped in seaweed and sushi rice.

title: Hamachi Roll
description: A roll filled with yellowtail (hamachi) slices, typically accompanied by green onions or cucumber, wrapped in seaweed and sushi rice.

title: Tamago Nigiri Roll
description: A roll featuring sweet Japanese omelet (tamago), sliced and served on top of a small bed of sushi rice.
